definition[0]: when someone obeys a rule, agreement, or demand

definition[1]: when someone obeys a law or rule or keeps an agreement
example[3]: The Coast Guard can board any ship and check its compliance with safety rules.
example[4]: The refinery is operating safely and in compliance with clean air standards.
